title: Strengthening App Development Practical Skills: Problem-Based Learning for Enhancing Elementary Higher-Order Thinking Skills (HOTS)

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematical concepts comprehension and basic problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners improve critical thinking skills by analyzing and solving complex mathematical problems using the PBSCL model.
Learners can derive three or more creative problem-solving strategies through social interaction with peers in a collaborative learning environment.
Learners implement Higher Order Thinking Skills (HOTS) applicable to real-world contexts with over 80% accuracy through LMS-based project deliverables.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
